titles.title: Hear me speedily, hear me O Lord

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Hear me speedily, hear me O Lord
Hide not Your face from me
Teach me to do Your will, for You are God
and lead me to the land of uprightness

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Cause me to hear Your lovingkindness in the morning
Cause me to see Your faithfulness when I awake
For in You Lord do I trust,
I lift up my soul unto You
Cause me to know the way that I should go.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Deliver me now O Lord, from my enemies
I run to Your hiding place
Quicken Your life in me, for Your Name's sake
And lead me in the way of righteousness
